item.content:encoded: OpenAI said it plans to halt the use of one of its ChatGPT voices that Her actor Scarlett Johansson says sounds eerily similar to her own.

item.title: Pentagon seeks public comment on defense industrial base adoption of AI - DefenseScoop
item.content:encoded: Responses are expected to inform a Trusted AI Defense Industrial Base Roadmap that officials plan to produce, according to a notice.
